oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battlefield Encampment
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sons of Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Sons of Veterans, U. S. A., invite members to participate and attend an encampment of the Order held in Knoxville, Tennessee. Important landmarks and battle-sites are described, including Fort Sanders, the National Cemetery, and the Confederate Cemetery. Knoxville's history, culture, and industries such as manufacturing and mining are highlighted for visitors.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military parades & ceremonies; Veterans; Pamphlets; Memorial rites & ceremonies;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
